title: Saul and the Witch of Endor
summary: As war looms, Saul desperately seeks guidance but God is silent. He visits a medium at Endor and asks her to summon Samuel. Samuelâ€™s spirit rebukes Saul, predicting his death the next day.

faq.question: Why did Saul visit the medium at Endor?
faq.answer: Because God was silent, and he wanted to speak with Samuel.

faq.question: What did Samuel say to Saul?
faq.answer: That God had rejected him and he would die the next day in battle.
